A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Lightsaber fight was cool\, but needed more of it.  Leia flying in space way stupid.  Rey parents reveal\, way stupid.  Snoke's lack of background information\, way stupid.  Everything with the casino\, way stupid.  Luke's arc and astral projection\, way stupid.  Only one light saber fight\, with no name bad guys was bad.  It needed more light saber fighting.  Laura Dern smashing the transport into Snoke's ship\, pretty stupid.  Why had that tactic never been used before?  Once again Rey can do everything with scant training.  And ghost Yoda interacting with the physical world is just the worst.
